revised_title: Barometrical Disturbances Caused by the 1883 Krakatoa Eruption
tldr: The author investigates a series of barometrical disturbances that occurred in Europe between August 27th and 31st, 1883, and links them to the violent volcanic eruption in the Straits of Sunda. The disturbances were propagated at high velocities and exhibited similar patterns at various observatories across Europe.
